attributes.action: Change the voting system to proportional representation.
attributes.additional_details:
Work towards making a truely democratic Britain!
In the referendum every vote mattered, and that needs to be the case each time we go to the polls. Proportional representation celebrates the diversity of the nation by giving individuals a voice.

Give people back control, join this petition for a proportional voting system.
attributes.background: We need a political system that enables people to have more influence, giving the opportunity to shape their own futures via the ballot box.
